roleset.name: measure
roleset.note: REGISTER-V NOTES: I rather doubt agents and yardsticks will appear in this sense. VN classe register-54.1-1. (from register.01-v)
REGISTER-N NOTES: Roleset based on register.01 (from register.01-n)

roles.note: Additional roles not seen in any examples. See verb entry for semantics of these roles. (from register.01-n)

example.name: with measurement
example.text: [John's reading ability]-1 was registered *trace*-1 at the fifth-grade level.

example.name: Args 0 & 1, within LVC
example.text: actually I was a bit bad too because %um I had you know you-1 had PRO-1 to keep register of the movement of the baby.
example.arg: of the movement of the baby

roleset.name: official record
roleset.note: REGISTER-V NOTES: VN class patent-101 (from register.02-v)
REGISTRATION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to register.02. See VN class patent-101. Framed by Katie. (from registration.01-n)

example.name: all args, odd order
example.text: HEALTHDYNE Inc., Atlanta, said its subsidiary, Home Nutritional Services Inc., registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission an initial public offering of four million shares of common.
example.arg: its subsidiary, Home Nutritional Services Inc. ,
with the Securities and Exchange Commission
an initial public offering of four million shares of common

example.name: unmentioned arg2
example.text: Excluding the gain, the company registered a modest 4.6% increase for the quarter ended Sept. 29 to $113 million, or 87 cents a share, from the year-earlier $107.9 million, or 84 cents a share.
example.arg: a modest 4.6% increase for the quarter ended Sept. 29 to $113 million, or 87 cents a share, from the year-earlier $107.9 million, or 84 cents a share

example.name: another marginal example
example.text: John registered with the Selective Service Administration.
[The number of people]-1 registered [*]-1 as jobless at the end of October declined by 900 from September to 78,600.

example.name: with an arg 2
example.text: volunteer's registration with the olympic committee
